procedure.title: 2023/14 Re Advertisement for the provision of Erasmus Project Hosting Organisations Year 2
procedure.description:
**Title: 2023/14 Re Advertisement for the Provision of Erasmus Project Hosting Organisations Year 2**

**Description:**
The Louth Meath Education and Training Board (LMETB) is seeking reputable hosting organisations registered in an EU country other than the Republic of Ireland. These organisations should have extensive experience in working with Erasmus+ projects under Key Action 1 – Learning Mobility of Individuals. LMETB is committed to excellence and innovation in education, catering to 30,000 students across the Louth and Meath region. The successful bidder will be part of a network that provides a wide range of educational services, including community national schools, post-primary schools, and further education and training programs. The hosting organisation should demonstrate a proven track record in managing international educational projects, ensuring high-quality delivery, and fostering a collaborative environment for learners. The proposal should outline the organisation's experience with Erasmus+ projects, their ability to host international students, and their commitment to promoting cultural exchange and educational excellence. Additionally, the bidder should provide details on their infrastructure, resources, and support services that will enhance the learning experience of participants. LMETB is dedicated to leaving no learner behind and is eager to collaborate with organisations that share this vision. The successful hosting organisation will contribute to the development of young people and adults in the region, aligning with LMETB's mission to provide innovative and inclusive education.
